## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G06960](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G06960)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PDE320, TGD4</u>
- **Gene Name:** PIGMENT DEFECTIVE 320, TRIGALACTOSYLDIACYLGLYCEROL 4
- **Description:**   pigment defective 320;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G06960.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G06960.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT3G06960.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G06960.2)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [tgd4-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The tgd4-1 plant is slightly pale green but  otherwise indistinguishable from the wild type. 
   - [tgd4-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Plants carrying the tgd4-2  T-DNA insertion allele were stunted, pale yellow in color, and infertile.
   - [tgd4-3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The tgd4-3 plant is slightly pale green but  otherwise indistinguishable from the wild type.
